name: Extended-Mood
description: 情态系统 (Modality System)：该系统用于分析语言资源如何表达说话者对命题真实性的判断（情态化）或对提议的义务性判断（意态）。

root.name: grammatical-unit
root.definition: 情态系统 (Modality System)：该系统用于分析语言资源如何表达说话者对命题真实性的判断（情态化）或对提议的义务性判断（意态）。

children.name: clause
children.definition: 小句层 (clause)

children.name: no-connector
children.definition: 无连接词 (no-connector)：小句之间没有连接词连接。

children.name: with-connector
children.definition: 有连接词 (with-connector)：小句通过连接词进行连接。

children.name: evidential-projection
children.definition: 证据投射 (evidential-projection)：表明信息来源或证据的语言结构。

children.name: no-evidential-projection
children.definition: 无证据投射 (no-evidential-projection)：不表明信息来源的普通陈述。

children.name: finite-clause
children.definition: 限定小句 (finite-clause)：包含限定动词的小句。

children.name: fact-clause
children.definition: 事实小句 (fact-clause)：陈述客观事实的小句。

children.name: interrogative-clause
children.definition: 疑问小句 (interrogative-clause)：表达疑问的小句。

children.name: relative-clause
children.definition: 关系小句 (relative-clause)：修饰名词的关系从句。

children.name: simple-finite-clause
children.definition: 简单限定小句 (simple-finite-clause)：结构简单的限定小句。

children.name: declarative-clause
children.definition: 陈述句 (declarative-clause)：陈述事实或观点的句子。

children.name: imperative-clause
children.definition: 祈使句 (imperative-clause)：表达命令或请求的句子。

children.name: interrogative-clause
children.definition: 疑问句 (interrogative-clause)：提出问题的句子。

children.name: that-clause
children.definition: that小句 (that-clause)：由that引导的从句。

children.name: existential-clause
children.definition: 存在句 (existential-clause)：表示存在关系的句子（如there be句型）。

children.name: extraposition
children.definition: 外置结构 (extraposition)：主语外置的句子结构。

children.name: interrogative-cleft
children.definition: 疑问分裂句 (interrogative-cleft)：疑问形式的分裂句。

children.name: it-cleft
children.definition: it分裂句 (it-cleft)：以it开头的分裂句结构。

children.name: postponement
children.definition: 延后结构 (postponement)：主要成分延后出现的结构。

children.name: unmarked-structure
children.definition: 无标记结构 (unmarked-structure)：常规的、无特殊标记的句子结构。

children.name: modal-clause
children.definition: 情态小句 (modal-clause)：包含情态动词的小句。

children.name: future-clause
children.definition: 将来时小句 (future-clause)：表达将来时间的小句。

children.name: true-modal-clause
children.definition: 真情态小句 (true-modal-clause)：包含真正情态动词的小句。

children.name: nonmodal-clause
children.definition: 非情态小句 (nonmodal-clause)：不包含情态动词的小句。

children.name: do-insert
children.definition: do插入 (do-insert)：使用助动词do的结构。

children.name: no-do-insert
children.definition: 无do插入 (no-do-insert)：不使用助动词do的结构。

children.name: past-clause
children.definition: 过去时小句 (past-clause)：表达过去时间的小句。

children.name: present-clause
children.definition: 现在时小句 (present-clause)：表达现在时间的小句。

children.name: future-perfect
children.definition: 将来完成时 (future-perfect)：will have + 过去分词。

children.name: future-progressive-perfect
children.definition: 将来进行完成时 (future-progressive-perfect)：will have been + 现在分词。

children.name: modal-perfect
children.definition: 情态完成时 (modal-perfect)：情态动词 + have + 过去分词。

children.name: modal-progressive-perfect
children.definition: 情态进行完成时 (modal-progressive-perfect)：情态动词 + have been + 现在分词。

children.name: past-perfect
children.definition: 过去完成时 (past-perfect)：had + 过去分词。

children.name: past-progressive-perfect
children.definition: 过去进行完成时 (past-progressive-perfect)：had been + 现在分词。

children.name: present-perfect
children.definition: 现在完成时 (present-perfect)：have/has + 过去分词。

children.name: present-progressive-perfect
children.definition: 现在进行完成时 (present-progressive-perfect)：have/has been + 现在分词。

children.name: simple-future
children.definition: 一般将来时 (simple-future)：will + 动词原形。

children.name: simple-modal
children.definition: 一般情态 (simple-modal)：情态动词 + 动词原形。

children.name: simple-past
children.definition: 一般过去时 (simple-past)：动词过去式。

children.name: simple-present
children.definition: 一般现在时 (simple-present)：动词现在式。

children.name: nonfinite-clause
children.definition: 非限定小句 (nonfinite-clause)：不包含限定动词的小句。

children.name: infinite-clause
children.definition: 不定式小句 (infinite-clause)：以to + 动词原形构成的小句。

children.name: past-participle-clause
children.definition: 过去分词小句 (past-participle-clause)：以过去分词开头的小句。

children.name: present-participle-clause
children.definition: 现在分词小句 (present-participle-clause)：以现在分词开头的小句。

children.name: not-perfect-aspect
children.definition: 非完成体 (not-perfect-aspect)：不表示完成的动作。

children.name: perfect-aspect
children.definition: 完成体 (perfect-aspect)：表示已完成的动作。

children.name: negative-clause
children.definition: 否定小句 (negative-clause)：表达否定意义的小句。

children.name: positive-clause
children.definition: 肯定小句 (positive-clause)：表达肯定意义的小句。

children.name: not-progressive-aspect
children.definition: 非进行体 (not-progressive-aspect)：不表示正在进行的动作。

children.name: progressive-aspect
children.definition: 进行体 (progressive-aspect)：表示正在进行的动作。

children.name: active-clause
children.definition: 主动语态小句 (active-clause)：主语执行动作的小句。

children.name: passive-clause
children.definition: 被动语态小句 (passive-clause)：主语承受动作的小句。

children.name: complex
children.definition: 复合体层 (complex)

children.name: adjp-complex
children.definition: 形容词词组复合体 (adjp-complex)：多个形容词词组组成的复合结构。

children.name: clause-complex
children.definition: 小句复合体 (clause-complex)：多个小句组成的复合结构。

children.name: np-complex
children.definition: 名词词组复合体 (np-complex)：多个名词词组组成的复合结构。

children.name: vp-complex
children.definition: 动词词组复合体 (vp-complex)：多个动词词组组成的复合结构。

children.name: group
children.definition: 词组层 (group)

children.name: adjectival-group
children.definition: 形容词词组 (adjectival-group)：以形容词为中心的词组。

children.name: adverbial-group
children.definition: 副词词组 (adverbial-group)：以副词为中心的词组。

children.name: interrogative-adverbial-group
children.definition: 疑问副词词组 (interrogative-adverbial-group)：用于疑问的副词词组。

children.name: noninterrogative-adverbial-group
children.definition: 非疑问副词词组 (noninterrogative-adverbial-group)：用于陈述的副词词组。

children.name: nominal-group
children.definition: 名词词组 (nominal-group)：以名词为中心的词组。

children.name: interrogative-noun-group
children.definition: 疑问名词词组 (interrogative-noun-group)：用于疑问的名词词组。

children.name: noninterrogative-noun-group
children.definition: 非疑问名词词组 (noninterrogative-noun-group)：用于陈述的名词词组。

children.name: common-group
children.definition: 普通词组 (common-group)：以普通名词为中心的词组。

children.name: determined-group
children.definition: 有限定词词组 (determined-group)：包含限定词的名词词组。

children.name: article-determined
children.definition: 冠词限定 (article-determined)：由冠词限定的词组。

children.name: a-determined
children.definition: 不定冠词限定 (a-determined)：由不定冠词a/an限定。

children.name: the-determined
children.definition: 定冠词限定 (the-determined)：由定冠词the限定。

children.name: demonstrative-determined
children.definition: 指示词限定 (demonstrative-determined)：由指示词限定的词组。

children.name: interrogative-determined
children.definition: 疑问词限定 (interrogative-determined)：由疑问词限定的词组。

children.name: possessive-determined
children.definition: 所有格限定 (possessive-determined)：由所有格限定的词组。

children.name: quantifier-determined
children.definition: 量词限定 (quantifier-determined)：由量词限定的词组。

children.name: a-few-determined
children.definition: a-few限定 (a-few-determined)：由"a few"限定。

children.name: a-little-determined
children.definition: a-little限定 (a-little-determined)：由"a little"限定。

children.name: all-determined
children.definition: all限定 (all-determined)：由"all"限定。

children.name: any-determined
children.definition: any限定 (any-determined)：由"any"限定。

children.name: both-determined
children.definition: both限定 (both-determined)：由"both"限定。

children.name: each-determined
children.definition: each限定 (each-determined)：由"each"限定。

children.name: either-determined
children.definition: either限定 (either-determined)：由"either"限定。

children.name: enough-determined
children.definition: enough限定 (enough-determined)：由"enough"限定。

children.name: every-determined
children.definition: every限定 (every-determined)：由"every"限定。

children.name: few-determined
children.definition: few限定 (few-determined)：由"few"限定。

children.name: little-determined
children.definition: little限定 (little-determined)：由"little"限定。

children.name: many-determined
children.definition: many限定 (many-determined)：由"many"限定。

children.name: more-determined
children.definition: more限定 (more-determined)：由"more"限定。

children.name: most-determined
children.definition: most限定 (most-determined)：由"most"限定。

children.name: much-determined
children.definition: much限定 (much-determined)：由"much"限定。

children.name: neither-determined
children.definition: neither限定 (neither-determined)：由"neither"限定。

children.name: no-determined
children.definition: no限定 (no-determined)：由"no"限定。

children.name: one-determined
children.definition: one限定 (one-determined)：由"one"限定。

children.name: other-determined
children.definition: other限定 (other-determined)：由"other"限定。

children.name: several-determined
children.definition: several限定 (several-determined)：由"several"限定。

children.name: some-determined
children.definition: some限定 (some-determined)：由"some"限定。

children.name: in-command
children.definition: 命令语境中 (in-command)：在祈使句中使用的量词。

children.name: in-question
children.definition: 疑问语境中 (in-question)：在疑问句中使用的量词。

children.name: in-statement
children.definition: 陈述语境中 (in-statement)：在陈述句中使用的量词。

children.name: in-negative-context
children.definition: 否定语境中 (in-negative-context)：在否定句中使用的量词。

children.name: in-positive-context
children.definition: 肯定语境中 (in-positive-context)：在肯定句中使用的量词。

children.name: few-in-negative-context
children.definition: few在否定语境错误 (few-in-negative-context)：few错误地用在否定语境中。

children.name: much-any-in-positive-statement
children.definition: much/any在肯定陈述错误 (much-any-in-positive-statement)：much/any错误地用在肯定陈述中。

children.name: no-quantifier-context-error
children.definition: 无量词语境错误 (no-quantifier-context-error)：量词使用正确。

children.name: some-in-negative-context
children.definition: some在否定语境错误 (some-in-negative-context)：some错误地用在否定语境中。

children.name: count-quantifier-with-noncount-noun
children.definition: 可数量词配不可数名词 (count-quantifier-with-noncount-noun)：语法错误。

children.name: no-quantifier-agreement-error
children.definition: 无量词一致性错误 (no-quantifier-agreement-error)：量词使用正确。

children.name: noncount-quantifier-with-count-noun
children.definition: 不可数量词配可数名词 (noncount-quantifier-with-count-noun)：语法错误。

children.name: plural-quantifier-with-singular-noun
children.definition: 复数量词配单数名词 (plural-quantifier-with-singular-noun)：语法错误。

children.name: singular-quantifier-with-plural-noun
children.definition: 单数量词配复数名词 (singular-quantifier-with-plural-noun)：语法错误。

children.name: intensified-quantification
children.definition: 强化量化 (intensified-quantification)：量词被程度副词修饰。

children.name: no-intensified-quantification
children.definition: 非强化量化 (no-intensified-quantification)：量词未被程度副词修饰。

children.name: not-determined-group
children.definition: 无限定词词组 (not-determined-group)：不包含限定词的名词词组。

children.name: not-predetermined-group
children.definition: 无前限定词组 (not-predetermined-group)：不包含前限定词的词组。

children.name: predetermined-group
children.definition: 有前限定词组 (predetermined-group)：包含前限定词的词组。

children.name: nonpartitive-predetermined
children.definition: 非部分格前限定 (nonpartitive-predetermined)：非部分关系的前限定。

children.name: partitive-predetermined
children.definition: 部分格前限定 (partitive-predetermined)：表示部分关系的前限定。

children.name: exclamative-predetermined
children.definition: 感叹前限定 (exclamative-predetermined)：感叹词作前限定词。

children.name: multiplier-predetermined
children.definition: 倍数前限定 (multiplier-predetermined)：倍数词作前限定词。

children.name: other-predetermined
children.definition: 其他前限定 (other-predetermined)：其他类型的前限定词。

children.name: quantifier-predetermined
children.definition: 量词前限定 (quantifier-predetermined)：量词作前限定词。

children.name: all-predetermined
children.definition: all前限定 (all-predetermined)：all作为前限定词。

children.name: much-premodified
children.definition: much前修饰 (much-premodified)：much被前置修饰。

children.name: some-predetermined
children.definition: some前限定 (some-predetermined)：some作为前限定词。

children.name: sufficiency-predetermined
children.definition: 充分性前限定 (sufficiency-predetermined)：表示充分性的前限定词。

children.name: no-predeterminer-error
children.definition: 无前限定词错误 (no-predeterminer-error)：前限定词使用正确。

children.name: wrong-quantifier-nonpartitive
children.definition: 错误量词非部分格 (wrong-quantifier-nonpartitive)：量词在非部分格中使用错误。

children.name: not-premodified-group
children.definition: 无前修饰词组 (not-premodified-group)：中心名词前无修饰语。

children.name: premodified-group
children.definition: 有前修饰词组 (premodified-group)：中心名词前有修饰语。

children.name: not-qualified-group
children.definition: 无后置限定词组 (not-qualified-group)：中心名词后无限定语。

children.name: qualified-group
children.definition: 有后置限定词组 (qualified-group)：中心名词后有限定语。

children.name: abstract-group
children.definition: 抽象词组 (abstract-group)：表示抽象概念的名词词组。

children.name: concrete-group
children.definition: 具体词组 (concrete-group)：表示具体事物的名词词组。

children.name: count-group
children.definition: 可数词组 (count-group)：以可数名词为中心的词组。

children.name: noncount-group
children.definition: 不可数词组 (noncount-group)：以不可数名词为中心的词组。

children.name: congruent-group
children.definition: 一致性词组 (congruent-group)：使用动词或形容词表达的一致性结构。

children.name: nominalised-group
children.definition: 名词化词组 (nominalised-group)：将动词或形容词名词化的结构。

children.name: pronominal-group
children.definition: 代词词组 (pronominal-group)：以代词为中心的词组。

children.name: proper-group
children.definition: 专有词组 (proper-group)：以专有名词为中心的词组。

children.name: plural-group
children.definition: 复数词组 (plural-group)：表示复数概念的词组。

children.name: singular-group
children.definition: 单数词组 (singular-group)：表示单数概念的词组。

children.name: prep-group
children.definition: 介词词组 (prep-group)：以介词为中心的词组。

children.name: interrogative-prep-group
children.definition: 疑问介词词组 (interrogative-prep-group)：用于疑问的介词词组。

children.name: noninterrogative-prep-group
children.definition: 非疑问介词词组 (noninterrogative-prep-group)：用于陈述的介词词组。

children.name: token
children.definition: 词汇层 (token)

children.name: punctuation
children.definition: 标点符号 (punctuation)：各种标点符号。

children.name: closequote
children.definition: 右引号 (closequote)：结束引用的标点。

children.name: comma
children.definition: 逗号 (comma)：逗号标点。

children.name: dollarsign
children.definition: 美元符号 (dollarsign)：货币符号$。

children.name: double-quote
children.definition: 双引号 (double-quote)：双引号标点。

children.name: exclamation-mark
children.definition: 感叹号 (exclamation-mark)：感叹号标点。

children.name: hatch
children.definition: 井号 (hatch)：#符号。

children.name: left-parenthesis
children.definition: 左括号 (left-parenthesis)：(符号。

children.name: openquote
children.definition: 左引号 (openquote)：开始引用的标点。

children.name: period
children.definition: 句号 (period)：句号标点。

children.name: question-mark
children.definition: 问号 (question-mark)：问号标点。

children.name: right-parenthesis
children.definition: 右括号 (right-parenthesis)：)符号。

children.name: semicolon
children.definition: 分号 (semicolon)：分号标点。

children.name: word
children.definition: 词 (word)：实际的词汇单位。

children.name: adjective
children.definition: 形容词 (adjective)：描述性词汇。

children.name: comparative-adjective
children.definition: 比较级形容词 (comparative-adjective)：表示比较的形容词形式。

children.name: simple-adjective
children.definition: 原级形容词 (simple-adjective)：形容词原形。

children.name: superlative-adjective
children.definition: 最高级形容词 (superlative-adjective)：表示最高程度的形容词形式。

children.name: adverb
children.definition: 副词 (adverb)：修饰动词、形容词或其他副词的词。

children.name: descriptive-adverb
children.definition: 描述性副词 (descriptive-adverb)：描述动作方式的副词。

children.name: direction-adverb
children.definition: 方向副词 (direction-adverb)：表示方向的副词。

children.name: intensifying-adverb
children.definition: 强化副词 (intensifying-adverb)：表示程度的副词。

children.name: interrogative-adverb
children.definition: 疑问副词 (interrogative-adverb)：用于疑问的副词。

children.name: more-adverb
children.definition: more副词 (more-adverb)：比较级标记词more。

children.name: most-adverb
children.definition: most副词 (most-adverb)：最高级标记词most。

children.name: noninterrogative-adverb
children.definition: 非疑问副词 (noninterrogative-adverb)：非疑问用途的副词。

children.name: place-time-adverb
children.definition: 时地副词 (place-time-adverb)：表示时间或地点的副词。

children.name: sufficiency-adverb
children.definition: 充分性副词 (sufficiency-adverb)：表示充分程度的副词。

children.name: cd
children.definition: 基数词 (cd)：表示数量的词。

children.name: conjunction
children.definition: 连词 (conjunction)：连接词语或句子的词。

children.name: coordinating-conjunction
children.definition: 并列连词 (coordinating-conjunction)：连接同等地位成分的连词。

children.name: subordinating-conjunction
children.definition: 从属连词 (subordinating-conjunction)：引导从句的连词。

children.name: determiner
children.definition: 限定词 (determiner)：限定名词的词。

children.name: interrogative-determiner
children.definition: 疑问限定词 (interrogative-determiner)：用于疑问的限定词。

children.name: noninterrogative-determiner
children.definition: 非疑问限定词 (noninterrogative-determiner)：用于陈述的限定词。

children.name: interrogative-word
children.definition: 疑问词 (interrogative-word)：用于提问的词。

children.name: wp
children.definition: 疑问代词 (wp)：who, what等疑问代词。

children.name: wrb
children.definition: 疑问副词 (wrb)：where, when等疑问副词。

children.name: noun
children.definition: 名词 (noun)：表示人、事物或概念的词。

children.name: common-noun
children.definition: 普通名词 (common-noun)：表示一般事物的名词。

children.name: count-noun
children.definition: 可数名词 (count-noun)：可以计数的名词。

children.name: noncount-noun
children.definition: 不可数名词 (noncount-noun)：不可计数的名词。

children.name: abstract-noun
children.definition: 抽象名词 (abstract-noun)：表示抽象概念的名词。

children.name: concrete-noun
children.definition: 具体名词 (concrete-noun)：表示具体事物的名词。

children.name: congruent
children.definition: 一致性 (congruent)：使用常规的动词或形容词表达。

children.name: nominalisation
children.definition: 名词化 (nominalisation)：将动词或形容词转化为名词形式。

children.name: proper-noun
children.definition: 专有名词 (proper-noun)：表示特定事物的名词。

children.name: plural-noun
children.definition: 复数名词 (plural-noun)：表示复数的名词形式。

children.name: singular-noun
children.definition: 单数名词 (singular-noun)：表示单数的名词形式。

children.name: pos
children.definition: 词性标记 (pos)：词性标注。

children.name: preposition
children.definition: 介词 (preposition)：表示关系的词。

children.name: normal-prep
children.definition: 普通介词 (normal-prep)：一般的介词。

children.name: to-prep
children.definition: to介词 (to-prep)：特殊的to介词。

children.name: pronoun
children.definition: 代词 (pronoun)：代替名词的词。

children.name: interrogative-pronoun
children.definition: 疑问代词 (interrogative-pronoun)：用于疑问的代词。

children.name: noninterrogative-pronoun
children.definition: 非疑问代词 (noninterrogative-pronoun)：用于陈述的代词。

children.name: plural-pronoun
children.definition: 复数代词 (plural-pronoun)：表示复数的代词。

children.name: singular-pronoun
children.definition: 单数代词 (singular-pronoun)：表示单数的代词。

children.name: three-pronoun
children.definition: 第三人称代词 (three-pronoun)：第三人称代词。

children.name: verb
children.definition: 动词 (verb)：表示动作或状态的词。

children.name: lexical-verb
children.definition: 实义动词 (lexical-verb)：有实际意义的动词。

children.name: 3ps-verb
children.definition: 第三人称单数动词 (3ps-verb)：第三人称单数现在时动词形式。

children.name: infinitive-verb
children.definition: 不定式动词 (infinitive-verb)：动词原形。

children.name: past-participle-verb
children.definition: 过去分词动词 (past-participle-verb)：过去分词形式。

children.name: past-verb
children.definition: 过去式动词 (past-verb)：动词过去式。

children.name: present-participle-verb
children.definition: 现在分词动词 (present-participle-verb)：现在分词形式。

children.name: present-verb
children.definition: 现在式动词 (present-verb)：动词现在式。

children.name: modal-aux
children.definition: 情态助动词 (modal-aux)：表示情态的助动词。

children.name: yes-no
children.definition: 是否词 (yes-no)：表示肯定或否定的词。

children.name: unkn
children.definition: 未知 (unkn)：无法确定类别的语言单位。
